title: p1 Adc(pref) can fill other Roles LFT
body:
Trying to get into a serious team that's looking to push Diamond maybe even Master this season, I am willing to learn, i have Skype and a working mic ( can get other Communications software 2 ) my main adc's are Vayne,Graves,Cait, however will learn any adc required.
I am 16 and Nz Auckland based, i can play daily and am willing to put in the time and effort.
ign Giggies
